EmailTemplate.name: HTML: Lead from Microsoft portal
EmailTemplate.subject: New lead from Microsoft portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly: New lead from Microsoft portal.</br> Name: {!Lead.Name}</br> Created date: {!Lead.CreatedDate}</br> Email address: {!Lead.Email}</br> </br></br> Open Lead: {!Lead.Link}</br> </br> </br> You can't respond to this email.</br> If you received this message in error, please contact your Salesforce administrator
